title: Rocket League sales revenue worldwide 2016
summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Month June 2016 and lowest at Month December 2015.
The highest Month June 2016 has 40.0 more Revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Month December 2015.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 2 number of Months.
The maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars 110.0 is found at Month June 2016 and the minimum is found at December 2015 where Month is 70.0.
The highest Month June 2016 has 40.0 more Revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Month December 2015.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars has reduced over the past 2 Months.
The average Revenue in million U.S. dollars in all 2 Months is 90.0.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is 180.0 if we add up values of all Months.
